ingredients.ingredient: ½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
½ (8 ounce) container herbed cream cheese
1 sprig fresh dill, finely chopped, or to taste

cookingTips: Spread cream cheese thinly to prevent excessive leaking during baking
Layer salmon evenly without overlapping too much to distribute flavor
Add fresh dill just before serving to preserve its bright, delicate flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me assemble elegant smoked salmon pinwheels with balanced herbed cream cheese and fresh dill
